name: Bambu Lab H2S 0.4 nozzle template time_lapse_gcode
time_lapse_gcode:
;========Date 20250925========
; SKIPPABLE_START
; SKIPTYPE: timelapse
M622.1 S1 ; for prev firmware, default turned on

M1002 judge_flag timelapse_record_flag
M622 J1

{if timelapse_type == 0} ; timelapse without wipe tower
    M971 S11 C10 O0
    M1004 S5 P1  ; external shutter
{elsif timelapse_type == 1} ; timelapse with wipe tower

    G150.3 ; move to garbage can
    M400

    M1004 S5 P1  ; external shutter
    M400 P300

    M971 S11 C10 O0
    M400 P350

    G90
    G1 Z{max_layer_z + 3.0} F1200
    G1 Y295 F30000
    G1 Y265 F18000
{endif}
M623

; SKIPPABLE_END
